entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
